solutions.text: If the user is getting error 'e11' try rebooting the device.
If the user is getting error 'e12' try to give the device a Fonzi's hit.
If the user is getting error 'e13' try to jump on the device.
If the user is getting error 'e13' try to throw the device out of the window.
If the user is getting error 'e21' try rebooting the device.
If the user is getting error 'e22' try to give the device a Fonzi's hit.
If the user is getting error 'e23' try to jump on the device.
If the user is getting error 'e23' try to throw the device out of the window.
